definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Clear responsibility for security, and make concerted efforts.
sentences.chinese: 明確安全責任，實現齊抓共管。

sentences.english: The sharpening administrative department harmonizes , formation grasps simultaneously big patterns of condominium.
sentences.chinese: 加強管理部門協調，形成齊抓共管大格局。

sentences.english: Company firmly holds that the talent is the basis and the quality is the key of company's development.
sentences.chinese: 公司堅持以人爲本，人才建設與質量控制齊抓共管。

sentences.english: Disputes are always aroused due to ownership in international condominium regions.
sentences.chinese: 國際共管地區經常因爲所屬權問題發生爭執。

sentences.english: Eventually the Egyptian government would come to refuse to recognize the Anglo-Egyptian Condominium as legal.
sentences.chinese: 最後，埃及政府開始拒絕承認英埃共管的合法性。

sentences.english: Policies on condo repairs are specified by condominium bylaws.
sentences.chinese: 共管柏文維修規則通常在公寓管理法規中詳細列出。

sentences.english: Buying a preconstruction condo unit is somewhat different with a freehold property.
sentences.chinese: 購買預建共管柏文，與購買既有物業有些許不同。

sentences.english: Suggestions for community co-management of natural resents in China are given.
sentences.chinese: 提出了我國自然保護區的社區共管工作的幾點建議。

definition: to lead (an animal by the head)/to take the lead/to coordinate (a combined operation)/to mediate/a go-between (e.g. marriage broker)
to do things each in one's own way
to join forces/to give full cooperation
test point/to carry out trial/pilot scheme
